title: Please don't forget that
body:
http://img1.leaguecraft.com/lol-splash-art/asset/wallpaper_760px_3712.jpg

This monkey of a splash art still exists

replies.body:
*clears throat*

http://loldb.gameguyz.de/images/skins_big_skin_fid_path/evelynn-shadow.jpg

We get that, which doesn't even look like half-decent fan art, instead of this:

http://img2.leaguecraft.com/lol-splash-art/asset/wallpaper_760px_6522.jpg

Not that Sivir's face doesn't look horrific in that or anything, I'm with you on that.

And while I thought of it, I'm not looking up Frostblade Irelia again, it's too depressing.

> [{quoted}](name=SelflessTeammate,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=b2udEe1y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-17T19:10:43.034+0000)

The one u suggested is even uglier.
It just looks like porn, which isnt fitting in a game. Not to mention the ugly face, and it doesn't evne look like eve
The one he suggested is far better. The face looks fine and doesn't look like Nicki Minaj anymore. It looks a lot more like the in game skin.

> [{quoted}](name=SelflessTeammate,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=b2udEe1y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-17T19:10:43.034+0000)
> And while I thought of it, I'm not looking up Frostblade Irelia again, it's too depressing.

Frostbooty Irelia.

No.

Frostbooty Assrelia :3

Good ol' Frostbutt Irelia. Back when Moneypenney, I believe it was, announced the pricing tiers people shit a collective and metaphorical brick at her being priced at 1350. 

That was an... interesting time, to say the least. CertainlyT hate was flying, Morello hate was on the ground slithering and devouring the defenseless, Kitae was being targeted while they peacocked the new lore changes and Moneypenney... he was on a whole other level of hate.

> [{quoted}](name=Anidan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=b2udEe1y,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-18T04:36:08.659+0000)
>
> That was an... interesting time, to say the least. CertainlyT hate was flying...

The more things change, the more they stay the same?
http://i.imgur.com/hwJlCsJ.jpg

http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Poppy_2.jpg

I hope they never change the splash art for this skin. Ever.
It'd be amazing if they updated Poppy but left this abomination of a splash art as it is, even if it no longer fits the actual skin, just for the sake of nostalgia.
THey updated Sion and still he has ALL the old splashes

#_When I see it on the loading screen...._


o____o
That is when you know... that you are screwed.
Looks quite epic to me.

http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Nidalee_4.jpg

Her face is dog like, her calves are bigger than her thighs, but its her broken neck always gets me.
im more annoyed by the hair, which makes her head seem twice as long as it should be.
And her spearhead is bigger than her torso.  And she can toss that thing!?  She must lift, but then I couldn't tell with those limp noodles she calls arms.
Yes that is called perspective... :D The spear tip is closer than her torso.
Ouch.

so does this 
http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Chogath_1.jpg
Looks like his classic splash art with a chroma pack on top of it.

Ye olde recolor skins: The real original chromas. 

Back to the age of Toxic Dr. Mundo, Nightmare Cho'Gath and mothafuckin' Rusty Blitzcrank, we go back to an age where skins meant 'recolor', which now means 'Chroma'. 

My how the times have changed. How long has it been again? Actually, don't tell me. I don't want to think about how much older I've gotten alongside this game.

It *may* be possible for someone to actually achieve that pose without breaking anything.
Naturally, this will have to be rectified.
Never forget Battle Flamingo Sivir.

http://orig12.deviantart.net/f91a/f/2014/149/1/d/soraka_splash_0_by_aaa_nymphea-d7kammx.jpg

Soraka is still bent like the wiggly Tetris piece, making her look like some kind of demented ostrich with hooves.

http://globe-views.com/dcim/dreams/ostrich/ostrich-04.jpg

> making her look like some kind of demented ostrich with hooves.

wait, that's not what she is?
No, in-game she's mostly purple tweenage elf goaticorn.  But she stands upright with a comfortable amount of spinal curvature.
I've always thought Soraka is really sexy. :\
Well dude buy a tablet and photoshop and try and draw a better one.

Why must I be able to draw it for me to criticize it? That's one of the most foolish arguments I've ever heard and for some reason people still find it worth saying. Critics don't have to have the ability to create what they are critiquing for them to have a negative opinion on the subject at hand. For example there are quite a few ugly car models and I can say that without having the ability to create it.

I agree, this argument is such nonsense and yet so overused.
Am I unable to appreciate a picture because I consider drawing to be tedious ?
You don't need to be an expert to recognize ugly.
I did not said they are not ugly. What I wanted to point out here is that you guys are disrespectfull. Its like sh*ting on your mothers cooking that she is giving you for free.

>Its like sh*ting on your mothers cooking that she is giving you for free.

But we buy these skins.

They ain't free.

And thus open to criticism.
You're still gonna play league right?

Its just so arrogant to criticize someone for doing something bad if you can't do it better. I for example draw and I know the time and effort it takes to create a digital illustration. Ofcourse if you think something is bad don't buy it but just take a piece of paper and try and draw something then upload it and see how people react to it. And then be the judge of other peoples work.
Oh and here is something I drew. Tell me your invaluable oppinion on it.
That's quite lovely art, very nicely done

You do realize if that was the case there would be no point in having forums right? Riot would say " You try making a fucking game and do better than us, if you can't then don't criticize our gameplay and shit" Yup that seems about right.
I was telling someone how this was the worst skin ever, then they gifted it to me.
I wouldn't complain, they still used money on you.
lol there alot of splash arts that needs redoing like this
what is that even called lol is that kingpin twitch?
I think it might've been "toxic twitch" but I wouldn't remember. It's a legacy skin (which never get an update)
all of Trundle's older splashes doe
outdated yes, "awful" no.
